string.name: icon_record_track
string.translation_description: The accessibility description for the record track icon.

string.name: icon_stop_recording
string.translation_description: The accessibility description for the stop recording icon.

string.name: icon_pause_recording
string.translation_description: The accessibility description for the pause recording icon.

string.name: generic_paused
string.translation_description: Text indicating a track is paused.

string.name: generic_recording
string.translation_description: Text indicating a track is recording.

string.name: generic_ok
string.translation_description: The text on a button to say ok.

string.name: help_indoor_tracks_question
string.translation_description: In the 'Help' page, the question on what is Indoor Tracks.

string.name: help_indoor_tracks_answer
string.translation_description: In the 'Help' page, the answer on what is Indoor Tracks.

resources.string: Indoor Tracks allows you to record indoor tracks and visualize your walking activity while watching live performance statistics. Indoor Tracks makes it easy to archive your training history with Google Maps and share your activities with friends and the world.

string.name: help_about
string.translation_description: In the 'Help' page, the button on the bottom to open the 'About Indoor Tracks' dialog.
